qas.question: In what year did Universal release three billion-dollar films?
Along with Jurassic World and Furious 7, what billion-dollar film was released by Universal in 2015?
How many studios have released three billion-dollar films in one year?
Who released three billion-dollar films in 2017?
What movies made three billion dollars?

context: As of <a0_0>2015<a0_0/>, <a2_0><b3_0>Universal<b3_0/> is the only studio<a2_0/> to have released three billion-dollar films in one year; this distinction was achieved in 2015 with <b4_0>Furious 7, Jurassic World and <a1_0>Minions<a1_0/>.
